commits.content:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en-US">

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Top Psychiatrist Gainesville FL | TMS Therapy & Mental Health Services | Dr. Lawrence Adu</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Leading Gainesville psychiatrist Dr. Lawrence Adu offers TMS therapy, forensic psychiatry, addiction medicine & mental health services. Board-certified with 17+ years experience. Call (352) 378-9116.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="psychiatrist Gainesville FL, TMS therapy Gainesville, mental health services Gainesville, Dr. Lawrence Adu, forensic psychiatry, addiction medicine, depression treatment, NeuroStar TMS, anxiety treatment, bipolar disorder, PTSD treatment">

    <!-- Enhanced SEO Meta Tags -->
    <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1">
    <meta name="googlebot" content="index, follow">
    <meta name="bingbot" content="index, follow">
    <meta name="author" content="Dr. Lawrence Adu">
    <meta name="publisher" content="Gainesville Psychiatry and Forensic Services">
    <meta name="copyright" content="Gainesville Psychiatry and Forensic Services">
    <meta name="language" content="en-US">
    <meta name="revisit-after" content="7 days">
    <meta name="distribution" content="global">
    <meta name="rating" content="general">
    <meta name="geo.region" content="US-FL">
    <meta name="geo.placename" content="Gainesville">
    <meta name="geo.position" content="29.6516;-82.3248">
    <meta name="ICBM" content="29.6516, -82.3248">

    <!-- Canonical and Alternate URLs -->
    <link rel="canonical" href="https://www.gainesvillepfs.com/">
    <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en-us" href="https://www.gainesvillepfs.com/">
    <link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="https://www.gainesvillepfs.com/">

    <!-- Favicon and Icons -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/assets/images/favicon.ico">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/assets/images/favicon-32x32.png">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/assets/images/favicon-16x16.png">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/assets/images/apple-touch-icon.png">
    <link rel="manifest" href="/assets/images/site.webmanifest">

    <!-- Preconnect for Performance -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://www.google-analytics.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://www.googletagmanager.com">

    <!-- Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <!-- CSS -->
    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/style.css> -->
    <style>
        /* ========================================
   TOP 1-5% PSYCHIATRIST WEBSITE CSS
   Modern, Mobile-First, Conversion-Optimized
   ======================================== */
        /* CSS Reset & Base Styles */
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
            font-size: 16px;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #2c3e50;
            background-color: #ffffff;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        /* Typography */
        
        h1,
        h2,
        h3,
        h4,
        h5,
        h6 {
            font-family: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif;
            font-weight: 600;
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #1a365d;
        }
        
        h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 4rem);
        }
        
        h2 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 3rem);
        }
        
        h3 {
            font-size: clamp(1.5rem, 3vw, 2rem);
        }
        
        h4 {
            font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 2.5vw, 1.5rem);
        }
        
        p {
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #4a5568;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }
        
        .lead {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #2d3748;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        /* Container */
        
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 1rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .container {
                padding: 0 2rem;
            }
        }
        /* Skip Link for Accessibility */
        
        .skip-link {
            position: absolute;
            top: -40px;
            left: 6px;
            background: #1a365d;
            color: white;
            padding: 8px;
            text-decoration: none;
            z-index: 1000;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }
        
        .skip-link:focus {
            top: 6px;
        }
        /* Header & Navigation */
        
        .header {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .nav-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 1rem 0;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding-left: 1rem;
            padding-right: 1rem;
        }
        
        .nav-logo .logo {
            height: 60px;
            width: auto;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .nav-logo .logo:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .nav-menu {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .nav-list {
            display: flex;
            list-style: none;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 2rem;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .nav-link {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: #2d3748;
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 1rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            padding: 0.5rem 0;
        }
        
        .nav-link:hover,
        .nav-link.active {
            color: #2b6cb0;
        }
        
        .nav-link::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: #2b6cb0;
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .nav-link:hover::after,
        .nav-link.active::after {
            width: 100%;
        }
        
        .nav-cta {
            margin-left: 1rem;
        }
        
        .nav-phone {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            background: #2b6cb0;
            color: white;
            padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(43, 108, 176, 0.3);
        }
        
        .nav-phone:hover {
            background: #2c5282;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(43, 108, 176, 0.4);
        }
        
        .phone-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        
        .nav-toggle {
            display: none;
            flex-direction: column;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .bar {
            width: 25px;
            height: 3px;
            background: #2d3748;
            margin: 3px 0;
            transition: 0.3s;
            border-radius: 2px;
        }
        /* Mobile Navigation */
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .nav-menu {
                position: fixed;
                top: 100%;
                left: 0;
                width: 100%;
                background: white;
                box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
                transform: translateY(-100%);
                opacity: 0;
                visibility: hidden;
                transition: all 0.3s ease;
            }
            .nav-menu.active {
                transform: translateY(0);
                opacity: 1;
                visibility: visible;
            }
            .nav-list {
                flex-direction: column;
                padding: 2rem 0;
                gap: 0;
            }
            .nav-item {
                width: 100%;
                text-align: center;
            }
            .nav-link {
                display: block;
                padding: 1rem 2rem;
                border-bottom: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
            }
            .nav-cta {
                margin: 1rem 0 0 0;
            }
            .nav-toggle {
                display: flex;
            }
            .nav-toggle.active .bar:nth-child(2) {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            .nav-toggle.active .bar:nth-child(1) {
                transform: translateY(8px) rotate(45deg);
            }
            .nav-toggle.active .bar:nth-child(3) {
                transform: translateY(-8px) rotate(-45deg);
            }
        }
        /* Main Content */
        
        .main {
            margin-top: 80px;
        }
        /* Hero Section */
        
        .hero {
            position: relative;
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .hero-background {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .hero-bg-image {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            opacity: 0.1;
        }
        
        .hero-overlay {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.9) 0%, rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.9) 100%);
        }
        
        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 3rem;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 80vh;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .hero-content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        .hero-text {
            color: white;
        }
        
        .hero-title {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .hero-title-main {
            display: block;
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 4rem);
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1.1;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .hero-title-sub {
            display: block;
            font-size: clamp(1.5rem, 3vw, 2rem);
            font-weight: 400;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.95;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        
        .hero-features {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .hero-features {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        .hero-feature {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.75rem;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }
        
        .feature-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #68d391;
        }
        
        .hero-cta {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .hero-cta {
                flex-direction: row;
                align-items: center;
            }
        }
        
        .hero-trust {
            margin-top: 2rem;
        }
        
        .trust-text {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            opacity: 0.8;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .trust-text {
                text-align: left;
            }
        }
        
        .hero-image {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        .dr-hero-image {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 400px;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .hero-badge {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: white;
            color: #2b6cb0;
            padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .badge-text {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
        }
        
        .badge-years {
            display: block;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        /* Trust Indicators */
        
        .trust-indicators {
            background: #f7fafc;
            padding: 3rem 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
        }
        
        .trust-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .trust-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .trust-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .trust-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
            text-align: left;
        }
        
        .trust-icon {
            font-size: 2rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        
        .trust-content h3 {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        
        .trust-content p {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #718096;
            margin: 0;
        }
        /* Section Styles */
        
        .section-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }
        
        .section-title {
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #1a365d;
        }
        
        .section-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: #4a5568;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        /* Services Overview */
        
        .services-overview {
            padding: 5rem 0;
            background: white;
        }
        
        .services-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .services-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
            .services-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .service-card {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .service-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }
        
        .service-card.featured {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            color: white;
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        
        .service-card.featured:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05) translateY(-5px);
        }
        
        .service-icon {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .service-icon .icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1));
        }
        
        .service-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: inherit;
        }
        
        .service-description {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        
        .service-features {
            list-style: none;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .service-features li {
            padding: 0.5rem 0;
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .service-features li::before {
            content: '✓';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: #68d391;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        
        .service-card.featured .service-features li::before {
            color: #ffd700;
        }
        
        .service-cta {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }
        /* About Dr. Adu */
        
        .about-dr-adu {
            padding: 5rem 0;
            background: #f7fafc;
        }
        
        .about-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 3rem;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .about-content {
                grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        .about-text h2 {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .credentials {
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }
        
        .credentials h3 {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        
        .credentials-list {
            list-style: none;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 0.75rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .credentials-list {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .credentials-list li {
            padding: 0.75rem 0;
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 1rem;
        }
        
        .credentials-list li::before {
            content: '✓';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: #2b6cb0;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        
        .expertise {
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }
        
        .expertise h3 {
            font-size: 1.3rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        
        .expertise-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .expertise-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .expertise-item {
            background: white;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
            border-left: 4px solid #2b6cb0;
        }
        
        .expertise-item h4 {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        
        .expertise-item p {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            margin: 0;
            color: #4a5568;
        }
        
        .about-image {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .dr-photo {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 400px;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .about-badge {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: white;
            color: #2b6cb0;
            padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 15px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        /* Testimonials */
        
        .testimonials {
            padding: 5rem 0;
            background: white;
        }
        
        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .testimonials-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .testimonial-card {
            background: #f7fafc;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
        }
        
        .testimonial-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }
        
        .testimonial-rating {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        
        .stars {
            color: #ffd700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        
        .rating-text {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #2d3748;
        }
        
        .testimonial-quote {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #4a5568;
            border: none;
            padding: 0;
        }
        
        .testimonial-author {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }
        
        .author-name {
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #2d3748;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .author-location {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #718096;
            margin: 0;
        }
        /* FAQ Section */
        
        .faq {
            padding: 5rem 0;
            background: #f7fafc;
        }
        
        .faq-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .faq-item {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 15px;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
            border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
        }
        
        .faq-question {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #2d3748;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            padding-right: 2rem;
        }
        
        .faq-question::after {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: 0;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #2b6cb0;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .faq-item.active .faq-question::after {
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }
        
        .faq-answer {
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .faq-item.active .faq-answer {
            max-height: 200px;
        }
        
        .faq-answer p {
            margin: 0;
            color: #4a5568;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        /* CTA Section */
        
        .cta-section {
            padding: 5rem 0;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            color: white;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .cta-content h2 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 3rem);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: white;
        }
        
        .cta-content p {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            opacity: 0.95;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }
        
        .cta-buttons {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 1rem;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 480px) {
            .cta-buttons {
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: center;
            }
        }
        
        .cta-info {
            margin-top: 2rem;
        }
        
        .cta-info p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            margin: 0;
        }
        /* Buttons */
        
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 2px solid transparent;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-align: center;
            justify-content: center;
            min-width: 160px;
        }
        
        .btn-primary {
            background: #2b6cb0;
            color: white;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(43, 108, 176, 0.3);
        }
        
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: #2c5282;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(43, 108, 176, 0.4);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary {
            background: transparent;
            color: #2b6cb0;
            border-color: #2b6cb0;
        }
        
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: #2b6cb0;
            color: white;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            color: #4a5568;
            border-color: #e2e8f0;
        }
        
        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: #f7fafc;
            border-color: #2b6cb0;
            color: #2b6cb0;
        }
        
        .btn-large {
            padding: 1.25rem 2.5rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }
        
        .btn-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        /* Footer */
        
        .footer {
            background: #1a365d;
            color: white;
            padding: 3rem 0 1rem;
        }
        
        .footer-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .footer-content {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            }
        }
        
        .footer-section h3 {
            color: white;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }
        
        .footer-section p {
            color: #a0aec0;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        
        .footer-section ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .footer-section ul li {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .footer-section ul li a {
            color: #a0aec0;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .footer-section ul li a:hover {
            color: white;
        }
        
        .contact-info p {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .contact-info a {
            color: #68d391;
            text-decoration: none;
        }
        
        .contact-info a:hover {
            text-decoration: underline;
        }
        
        .footer-note {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: #718096;
        }
        
        .footer-bottom {
            border-top: 1px solid #2d3748;
            padding-top: 2rem;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 1rem;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        @media (min-width: 768px) {
            .footer-bottom {
                flex-direction: row;
                justify-content: space-between;
            }
        }
        
        .footer-bottom p {
            color: #a0aec0;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .footer-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        
        .footer-links a {
            color: #a0aec0;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        
        .footer-links a:hover {
            color: white;
        }
        /* Responsive Design */
        
        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .container {
                padding: 0 1rem;
            }
            .hero-content {
                text-align: center;
            }
            .hero-cta {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 300px;
            }
            .service-cta {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            .cta-buttons {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
        }
        /* Accessibility */
        
        @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
            * {
                animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
                animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
                transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
            }
            html {
                scroll-behavior: auto;
            }
        }
        /* Focus Styles */
        
        *:focus {
            outline: 2px solid #2b6cb0;
            outline-offset: 2px;
        }
        /* High Contrast Mode */
        
        @media (prefers-contrast: high) {
            .hero {
                background: #000;
                color: #fff;
            }
            .btn-primary {
                background: #000;
                border-color: #fff;
            }
            .btn-secondary {
                background: #fff;
                color: #000;
                border-color: #000;
            }
        }
        /* Print Styles */
        
        @media print {
            .header,
            .footer,
            .cta-section,
            .nav-toggle {
                display: none;
            }
            .main {
                margin-top: 0;
            }
            .hero {
                min-height: auto;
                background: none;
                color: #000;
            }
            .hero-background,
            .hero-overlay {
                display: none;
            }
            .btn {
                border: 1px solid #000;
                background: none;
                color: #000;
            }
        }
        /* Performance Optimizations */
        
        .hero-bg-image,
        .dr-hero-image,
        .dr-photo {
            will-change: transform;
        }
        
        .service-card,
        .testimonial-card {
            will-change: transform;
        }
        /* Loading States */
        
        .loading {
            opacity: 0.6;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        /* Error States */
        
        .error {
            border-color: #e53e3e;
            background-color: #fed7d7;
        }
        /* Success States */
        
        .success {
            border-color: #38a169;
            background-color: #c6f6d5;
        }
    </style>

        <!-- Services Overview -->
        <section class="services-overview" role="region" aria-labelledby="services-title">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="section-header">
                    <h2 id="services-title" class="section-title">Comprehensive Mental Health Services</h2>
                    <p class="section-subtitle">Evidence-based treatments tailored to your unique needs</p>
                </div>
                <div class="services-grid">
                    <article class="service-card featured">
                        <div class="service-icon">
                            <img src="/assets/images/tms-icon.svg" alt="TMS Therapy" class="icon" width="60" height="60">
                        </div>
                        <h3>NeuroStar TMS Therapy</h3>
                        <p class="service-description">FDA-approved transcranial magnetic stimulation for treatment-resistant depression. Non-invasive, drug-free treatment with proven results.</p>
                        <ul class="service-features">
                            <li>FDA-approved treatment</li>

        <!-- FAQ Section -->
        <section class="faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="faq-title">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 id="faq-title" class="section-title">Frequently Asked Questions</h2>
                <div class="faq-grid">
                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <h3 class="faq-question">What is TMS therapy and how does it work?</h3>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>TMS (Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation) therapy is an FDA-approved, non-invasive treatment for depression. It uses magnetic fields to stimulate nerve cells in the brain, particularly in areas associated with mood regulation.
                                The treatment is painless and doesn't require anesthesia.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <h3 class="faq-question">Do you accept insurance?</h3>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Yes, we accept most major insurance plans including Medicare, Medicaid, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, and UnitedHealthcare. Please call us to verify your specific coverage.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <h3 class="faq-question">How long does a typical appointment last?</h3>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Initial consultations typically last 60-90 minutes, while follow-up appointments are usually 30-45 minutes. TMS therapy sessions are 20-40 minutes each.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <h3 class="faq-question">What conditions do you treat?</h3>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We treat a wide range of mental health conditions including depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, PTSD, ADHD, OCD, addiction, and other psychiatric disorders.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
